name: Quadimension
description:
Quadimension is a short, easy vertical scrolling shoot-em-up game with a retro style and keyboard and gamepad support.

Try to reach 444 points to win the game! Half points are lost upon defeat but can be picked up again later.

Keyboard Controls:
W,A,S,D: Move
Space: Shoot
F: Fullscreen On/Off
R: Reset Game
Esc: Exit Game

Gamepad Controls:
Joystick/D-Pad: Move
A: Shoot
LB: Fullscreen On/Off
RB: Reset Game
Back/Select: Exit Game

For thoughts, questions, or feedback contact: NewExperienceWorkshop@gmail.com
